website_summaries.verdict: A basic, understated design in a classic link that fits most ankles, but has some durability concerns.
pros: Italian-made sterling silver in a classic rope design
Comes in four sizes - 7.5, 9, 10, and 11 inches
cons: Clasp could be sturdier, and the chain and clasp has been known to break

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ankle bling!
customer_reviews.text: It's so dainty and pretty. But, like all things feminine, it's sturdy. I put mine on as soon as I received it, which was quickly, and haven't taken it off. Still shines like the day I put it on. Love it so much, I bought one for my future daughter-in-law for her birthday in a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simplistic and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. Super elegant. Very sparkly. Very simple. So far so good, seems to be of very sturdy quality. Fits great. Would buy again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL ANKLES
customer_reviews.text: I had some difficulty with the shipment but that was a miscommunication between amazon and myself.I bought 2 one for each ankle and I am in love!!! They came super fast and are extremely beautiful. They are elegant and dainty; I wear them in the shower and they still shine and haven't turned green.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price, very happy. It’s pretty, the 11’ is kinda large, wish I got the 10 inch tho. I’m of average build 5’5 150lbs. My ankles are kinda thick too so the 11 inch was still very loose. However it still looks nice. I would hit this again or gift it, it’s so lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Aminta Arnoldussen

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: The perfect anklet for me. The only time I have taken it off since it arrived was to have a pedicure. It is comfortable to sleep in and with every type of shoe. I couldn't be more pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Connaid

customer_reviews.title: Update to Sturdy & Very Pretty Review on 5/17/18 - Still Happy on 10/03/19!
customer_reviews.text: Original Review on 5/17/18: Anklet ordered 5/09/18, arrived quickly and fits perfectly....Size 10 hangs a tad bit (but not so that it catches on heels of shoes), which is what I wanted. Nice amount of sparkle to this very pretty and thin but sturdy ankle bracelet, too. Great deal! Update as of 10/03/19: I have been wearing this anklet every day since it arrived........still sturdy and sparkly!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, dainty, shiny, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received them today so I can't testify to their durability or sturdiness. I ordered one for each ankle and put them on immediately. They are dainty and shiny and perfect for me. If you are looking for an anklet that is big and bold then this is not for you. This is subtle and pretty. My past experience with rope chains has always been positive. They have always been reliable and not easily broken. So, I am looking forward to having these anklets and enjoying them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this anklet a couple months ago to wear at the beach. I've kept it on since purchasing. I sleep and bathe with it on and it's as shiny as the day I received it! I love it! Great quality product and good price, I expected it to last for a couple weeks which I was fine with since it was so cheap but it's surpassed my expectations and it's super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A sweet little anklet that is exactly what I'd been looking for to replace one I wore for a decade. I was worried it'd be too thin, but it's perfect. Doesn't slide below the sneaker tab, which is great for the daily walk.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Reader

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last
customer_reviews.text: Durabulity seems ok, zero for longevity. I only used this once. It's been placed in a jewelry box ever since from the fear of it turning "yellow". Doesn't matter because it did anyway. It looks dingy and dirty and it's been put away. And I never once got it wet so it's not that. Grant it this was cheap, but I seriously thought I'd be able to wear it more than once! Unfortunately the return/refund window passed.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Lynn B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it . Had it for two months hasn’t turned color . Very durable she showers with it and never takes it off. I say it’s a win for the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Hopewell’s

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty anklet
customer_reviews.text: I love this ankle bracelet. It's so pretty and sparkles when it catches the light. It came very quickly and I am pleased with my purchase. I did order myself the wrong size, totally my fault so I am giving it to my granddaughter. I ordered myself another one in 9" and it's perfect. It also came so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size is all off! smh
customer_reviews.text: I’m a little upset because I was in search of a anklet I would really like and I loved the reviews upon searching and decided to go with this anklet.. beautiful anklet but I order sized down as it states “runs big” listed in product details.. big mistake! wish I order a size bigger. Anklet does not run big, it runs small. I can’t even get it to reach around my ankle to clasp.. Bummer, have to return.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Clasp
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice anklet, but the clasp was defective and as such, it kept falling off. I'd love to give this product a better review because as I as said, it's pretty. Unfortunately, it's not functional since it won't stay clasped.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Dainty
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for anklet, but got too small of a size(7.). Wearing as a bracelet and live for something light and dainty in the summer. Will probably order larger size for ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are accurate
customer_reviews.text: Haven't taken off since it arrived. No discoloration like others also confirmed. Stood up to the ocean too!! Thin, dainty and cute. Might even double up so its more noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sparkle
customer_reviews.text: This ankle bracelet is absolutely beautiful. The sterling silver shine when light hits it is just gorgeous. I would recommend this bracelet to anyone who wants to add some sexy sparkle to their ankle, not only in the summer, but all year long.
customer_reviews.author: pansies1953

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Anklet
customer_reviews.text: I never take it off... no discoloration or issues. I wear my ankles & toe rings 24/7. This anklet is very shiny and well made. I'm tempted to buy an additional one just to have a spare on hand. This was definitely an awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: HoneySnoBunny

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Got one for myself, lived it so much I bought one for my mom. Surprisingly sturdy and really lovely!!! Will be buying more. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased five for gifts and everyone adores them!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful anklet with a vibrant finish and intricate weaving! I have purchased five for gifts and everyone adores them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and great price. Perfect subtle way to dress yourself up a little. Pictured is the 10” anklet. I’m 5’7” and it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice anklet
customer_reviews.text: I love this anklet. It's pretty, dainty, sturdy feel and absolutely does not look cheap or cheesy.
customer_reviews.author: Aliyah

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: For a cheap anklet it’s beautiful. Perfect for summer time and with the price if it only last a few months I’ll be happy but so far it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this anklet after reading all the reviews of how long it lasts. Mine didn’t last 5 min. As you can see by my photo it broke before i even got to wear it out of my house. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie N.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This item was true to size. I wish I would have looked at that. The item is comfortable and shiny. It is pretty and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Meridianpeaks

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing purchase for the money. Seems tonight and strong. Have been wearing this for a month straight without taking it off and I’ve had no issues, it’s not turning, it looks beautiful! I am very happy with this ankle bracelet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this anklet. For the price I didn’t know what to expect. It’s beautiful, sturdy and looks more expensive. I would but again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and expensive looking
customer_reviews.text: I love this anklet. I like that you can order your size as I have really small ankles. I have worn it for several months daily and it has held up great! Many complements, nice little sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: lisa robert

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Lovvvvve this anklet. Super dainty and cute. Only worn it for a few days and have gotten tons of compliments already.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Great fit,  maybe not everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly and matched the picture exactly. I have not taken it off since receiving it over a month ago. I didn't give 5 stars because it's starting to turn.
customer_reviews.author: Belicia

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This piece is stunning. Very shiny on my ankle and durable. I’ve not taken it off in a couple of months. Very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Lays flat and doesn’t catch on clothing. Good quality clasp. Very shiny and dainty.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: It’s large if you have small ankles
customer_reviews.text: This was a Bridal Shower present. I needed an anklet that would be able to have a sapphire pendant on it and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: rhonda b

customer_reviews.title: Very very big - returned it
customer_reviews.text: Very very big.... I do not have a tiny ankle, I think it’s normal to big & this anklet was way to big.
customer_reviews.author: J & K Mac

customer_reviews.title: Too big and too fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Aside from it being huge on my ankle, it broke the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Sterling anklet
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the anklet. It is exactly what was shown and described.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Safko

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sturdy little anklet! I would recommend it to anyone looking for a nice basic anklet
customer_reviews.author: STillie

customer_reviews.title: Looked great, then after a short period of time
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, then after a short period of time, the silver turned. Silver cleaner does not work. Now looks "Grey". I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well made! Gave as a gift! It has the .925 sterling silver made in Italy stamped on it! Nice piece!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not good craftsmanship when made
customer_reviews.text: Loved this when i got it. Loved it when i put it on .Im a big lady and fit perfectly. Had iy on about a hour and it was sticking i start looking and it is coming apart. I dont understand. Must be a defect in the craftsmanship .makes me sad its hard to find a good sized one.so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M Dennie

customer_reviews.title: I love anklets but have trouble finding ones that fit my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love anklets but have trouble finding ones that fit my unusually large ankles. This fits, has some extra dangle length, and looks adorable! Very sparkly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but too small for an ankle
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is beautiful but too small. I bought 2 bracelets and this one can be used for a small wrist but will not work for an ankle. It is nice an well made. Good clasp too.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert007

customer_reviews.title: Dainty and perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, dainty anklet. I’ve been wearing it for a couple of weeks and it doesn’t tarnish or turn you green.
customer_reviews.author: Kat B

customer_reviews.title: Great diamond cut
customer_reviews.text: I love this chain. Because it is diamond cut, it has a lot of sparkle. The size is great and it is very durable. I wear it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits a larger ankle perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely, bright silver ankle bracelet. Fits perfect! I was so happy to find a larger than standard selection. Coukd not be more pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Ankle bracelet was just what I expected. No complaints so far. Been wearing it since it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I love the ankle bracelet and it's of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the ankle bracelet and it's of good quality. There's just one thing -- I want to exchange for a smaller size but a return label was not enclosed with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful, durable anklet chain!
customer_reviews.text: This anklet is a beautiful and very strong silver rope chain. I bought it for some silver charms I had purchased on a trip. The chain has held up well around my ankle! I would definitely purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good look
customer_reviews.text: I needed a smaller size, but still a great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have not taken it off since I purchased it. I have exercised while wearing it, showered, been in the rain and slept in it. It has not tarnished one bit. It is just as bright and beautiful as when I bought it. Excellent product for an even better price.
customer_reviews.author: Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute! I end up being allergic to most jewelry, but this one has held up well with no irritation to my skin
customer_reviews.author: B Bods

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice & sturdy and not cheap looking. Very good buy

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice bling for my ankle I love it durable and pretty doesn’t feel cheap

customer_reviews.title: It's very pretty just too big
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty just too big. I hope it doesn't fall off my foot! I even measured the 11 inches around my ankle before I ordered. I like it though and will keep.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 11in. I love this cute little ankletI I am highly allergic to nickel and this has been on my body 24/7 for a couple weeks without a breakout of eczema. Its is dainty and strong. Sparkles in light and hangs just below my ankle bone. Would purchase again for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: marchella versteegh

customer_reviews.title: Seems very sturdy. Hoping it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know I have this anklet on; it's great.

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I love this anklet....too shiny ....so cheap...but I like it am gonna test it for a while if it disnt tarnished I will buy more products from the a seller

customer_reviews.title: Its simple elegance at its best. The diamond cut gives it exquisit sparkle
customer_reviews.text: Its simple elegance at its best. The diamond cut gives it exquisit sparkle. Its diameter is delicate and feminine looking without any extra bling it is a classy and understated look.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful anklet. It looks like a really expensive one. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't taken it off.

customer_reviews.title: Delicate yet sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chain. Delicate but sturdy! I wore it all summer, at the beach and even showered with it on and it’s held up great! Great value foe the money!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wear it daily. It’s a thin chain, so it’s subtly there.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it Fits my ankle but bought for two friends ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it Fits my ankle but bought for two friends and it did not go around their ankles It was tight for me

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!

customer_reviews.text: the chain was nice, but it was way too big for my ankle. i had to return it. perhaps would be ok for someone with larger ankles.

customer_reviews.title: STILL BEAUTIFUL AFTER 2 YEARS!

customer_reviews.title: Love this anklet!

product_meta.title: Sterling Silver 1.5mm Diamond-Cut Rope Nickel Free Chain Anklet Italy
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :May 22, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Joyful Creations
 * ASIN :B00Y27WD8E

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #23,925 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #334 inGirls' Jewelry 
    *  #42 inWomen's Anklets 
    *  #1296 inNovelty & More 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars674 ratings
feature_bullets: Anklet - Diamond-cut facets the length of the chain for extra sparkle
Measured from loop end to spring ring clasp
925 solid sterling silver chain, imported from Italy
Check your ankle size before ordering! Bracelet is typically 7.5"
